summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of Lots 8 to 19 inclusive, Austin's Airport Addition, and the south 15 feet of Lot 3 and all of Lots 4, Acre 1, Block 15, Maple Leaf Addition to Green Lake Circle, with respect to Use and Area Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto two new sections numbered 2-144 and 17-105, respectively.
